parameter.name: OpenItems.Properties.Settings.DefaultConn-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: OpenItems.Properties.Settings.DefaultConn Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: server=eaterofjellybeans.database.windows.net; database=OpenItems; User ID=cwatson; Password=examplePass ; Integrated Security=false

parameter.name: OpenItems.Properties.Settings.DocsConn-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: OpenItems.Properties.Settings.DocsConn Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: server=P11H4M-SQLD02\P11SQD02; database=DocStorage; User ID=examplePass ; Password=examplePass ; Integrated Security=false
